bill.summary: 1/17/2012--Introduced. Dollars to the Classroom Act - Requires at least 95% of any federal funds made available to a state by the Secretary of Education for elementary or secondary education to be used for: (1) academic purposes, and (2) classroom-related purposes or at the school level.
